mapper.select: select o.seq as orderSeq, m.name as productName, m.image as productImage, m.brand as productBrand, od.option_name as optionName, to_char(o.reg_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss (DY)') as regDt, od.quantity as quantity, to_char(m.price * od.quantity, '999,999,999') as orderPrice, od.order_Status as orderStatus from order_details_tbl3 od, order_tbl3 o, men_product_tbl2 m where o.seq = od.order_seq and m.seq = od.product_seq and o.user_seq = #{userSeq} order by regdt desc

select m.image as productImage, m.brand as productBrand, od.option_name as optionName, to_char(m.price, '999,999,999') as orderPrice , m.name as productName, od.quantity as quantity, od.order_status as orderStatus from order_details_tbl3 od, men_product_tbl2 m where od.order_seq = #{orderSeq} and m.seq = od.product_seq

select o.seq as seq, to_char(o.reg_dt, 'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi') as regDt, o.name as name, o.phone as phone, o.address as address, o.note as note, to_char(sum(decode(od.order_status, '주문완료', m.price)), '999,999,999') as totalPrice from order_tbl3 o, order_details_tbl3 od, men_product_tbl2 m where o.seq = od.order_seq and od.product_seq = m.seq and o.seq = #{orderSeq} group by o.seq, o.reg_dt, o.name, o.phone, o.address, o.note, o.total_price
